page.title: 10MANSFIELD MARATHON
page.content: {*********'MARATHON BOY'********* MY NAME IS SIMON PEPPER.I AM 11 YRS OLD.MY BIRTHDAY IS OCTOBER 10TH.THE DAY IS SUNDAY 7th JULY 7.00am 1985.I GOT OUT OF BED QUICKLY BECAUSE IT IS MY SPECIAL DAY.I GOT WASHED AND DRESSED AND PUT MY RUNNING KIT ON.IT WAS MY BLACK P.E SHORTS AND MY CANCER RELIEF VEST.TODAY IS THE DAY I'M GOING TO RUN THE HALF MARATHON WHICH IS 13.1 MILES.I LIKE RUNNING LONG DISTANCES . THERE WERE 3000 RUNNERS IN THE MARATHON.MY NUMBER WAS 59.THE MARATHON WAS SPONSORED BY MANSFIELD BUILDING SOCIETY BUT EACH MILE WAS SPONSORED BY DIFFERENT COMPANIES.AT 9.00am THEY SET US OFF WITH A BIG CANNON,IT TOOK ME 1HOUR 39 MINUTES TO DO 13.1 MILES.WHEN I HAD FINISHED I WAS EXHAUSTED.THEN I WENT TO MY GRANDAD'S AND HAD A BATH I HAD MY TEA THERE AND WENT HOME AT 10.00pm.
